hero.title: AgriConnect
hero.subtitle: Connecting Farmers to the Future
hero.description: Bridge the gap between farmers and markets. Get the right price for your crops, access fertilizers directly, and fight inflation with our AI-powered platform.

problemSection.title: Challenges Farmers Face Today
problemSection.desc: Despite being the backbone of our economy, farmers struggle with systemic issues that prevent them from earning fair profits and accessing modern farming solutions.
problemSection.wrongPricingDesc: Farmers don't get fair market prices for their crops due to information gaps.
problemSection.middlemenDesc: Heavy reliance on intermediaries reduces farmer profits significantly.
problemSection.weatherDesc: Unpredictable weather patterns cause massive crop losses without proper guidance.
problemSection.inflationDesc: Rising costs and inflation affect both farmers and consumers nationwide.
problemSection.limitedMarketDesc: Farmers sell to local mandis at low prices due to lack of broader market reach.
problemSection.infoGapDesc: No real-time pricing, weather updates, or market demand insights.
problemSection.supplyChainDesc: Complex distribution chains increase costs for everyone.
problemSection.perFamily: Per farming family due to these challenges

solutionSection.title: AgriConnect: Bridging the Gap
solutionSection.desc: We connect farmers directly to markets, eliminate middlemen, and provide AI-powered tools to maximize profits while fighting inflation.
solutionSection.valueDesc: Direct selling reduces *mahangai* (inflation) in high-demand regions while ensuring farmers get fair prices.
solutionSection.directAccessDesc: Connect farmers directly to mandis and buyers for better prices.
solutionSection.realtimeDesc: Live market rates and demand insights across all major mandis.
solutionSection.eliminateMiddlemenDesc: Sell grains and crops directly through our verified platform.
solutionSection.integratedFertilizersDesc: Easy access to quality fertilizers at competitive prices.
solutionSection.step1Desc: Farmer uploads crop details with photos and quantity.
solutionSection.step2Desc: AI shows real-time prices across all mandis and demand centers.
solutionSection.step3Desc: Select direct sale or marketplace based on highest profit potential.
solutionSection.step4Desc: Real-time tracking from pickup to delivery with secure payments.

featuresSection.title: Everything Farmers Need in One App
featuresSection.desc: From AI-powered crop management to direct marketplace access, AgriConnect provides comprehensive tools to modernize farming and maximize profits.
featuresSection.aiCropDiseaseDesc: Upload crop photos and get instant disease diagnosis with treatment recommendations.
featuresSection.weatherFarmingDesc: AI-powered weather analysis and farming suggestions for optimal yield.
featuresSection.multilingualChatbotDesc: Voice and text support in Hindi, English, and regional languages.
featuresSection.statePricingDesc: Real-time crop prices across all Indian states and major mandis.
featuresSection.digitalWalletDesc: Secure payments with integrated digital wallet and UPI support.
featuresSection.liveTrackingDesc: Track your orders from farm to doorstep with real-time updates.
featuresSection.pestMapsDesc: Interactive maps showing pest outbreaks and prevention measures.
featuresSection.yieldForecastingDesc: AI predicts crop yield based on weather, soil, and farming practices.
featuresSection.farmerTradingDesc: Direct trading between farmers for seeds, equipment, and knowledge.
featuresSection.cropInsuranceDesc: AI-powered insurance recommendations and claim assistance.
featuresSection.multiLanguageDesc: Available in 12+ Indian languages with voice recognition.
featuresSection.farmSimulationDesc: Virtual farm modeling to optimize resources and maximize profits.
featuresSection.advancedAIDesc: Cutting-edge technology that brings the future of farming to your fingertips
featuresSection.smartCropAnalysisDesc: AI analyzes soil conditions, weather patterns, and crop health to provide personalized recommendations for maximum yield.
featuresSection.precisionFarmingDesc: Satellite imagery and IoT sensors create detailed farm maps for precise resource allocation and monitoring.
featuresSection.automatedInsightsDesc: Real-time notifications about market opportunities, weather alerts, and optimal farming actions.

marketplaceHome.title: Fresh From Farm to Your Doorstep
marketplaceHome.desc: Buy directly from farmers at fair prices. Support local agriculture while getting fresh, quality produce with real-time pricing and tracking.
marketplaceHome.directFromFarmersDesc: No middlemen, fair prices for everyone

fertilizerHome.title: AI-Powered Fertilizer Recommendations
fertilizerHome.desc: Get personalized fertilizer recommendations based on your soil analysis, crop type, and growth stage. Shop from verified suppliers at competitive prices.
fertilizerHome.getRecommendationDesc: Tell us about your soil and crop for AI-powered fertilizer advice
fertilizerHome.yieldOptimizationDesc: AI recommendations increase crop yield by up to 30%
fertilizerHome.verifiedQualityDesc: All fertilizers tested for purity and effectiveness
fertilizerHome.ecoFriendlyDesc: Organic and sustainable fertilizer choices available
fertilizerHome.digitalSoilTestingDesc: Upload a photo of your soil sample for instant AI analysis
fertilizerHome.uploadSoilPhoto: Click to upload soil sample photo
fertilizerHome.soilPhotoTips: üì± How to take the perfect soil sample photo:
fertilizerHome.tip1: Take a handful of soil from 6-inch depth
fertilizerHome.tip2: Use natural daylight for the photo
fertilizerHome.tip3: Include a coin for size reference
fertilizerHome.tip4: Ensure soil is slightly moist, not dry

aiChatbot.title: Your Personal Farming AI Assistant
aiChatbot.desc: Get instant answers in your preferred language. Ask about crop prices, farming techniques, weather forecasts, disease diagnosis, and more - available 24/7.
aiChatbot.multilingualSupportDesc: Chat in Hindi, English, Punjabi, Marathi, Bengali, Telugu, and more regional languages.
aiChatbot.voiceRecognitionDesc: Speak naturally in your language - our AI understands accents and dialects perfectly.
aiChatbot.availabilityDesc: Get instant answers anytime - market prices, weather updates, farming advice, and more.

pricingSection.title: Choose Your Farming Journey
pricingSection.desc: Start free and upgrade as you grow. No hidden fees, no complex contracts. Just transparent pricing that scales with your farming success.
pricingSection.farmerBasicDesc: Perfect for individual farmers starting their digital journey
pricingSection.farmerProDesc: Advanced features for serious farmers to maximize profits
pricingSection.farmEnterpriseDesc: Comprehensive solution for large farms and agricultural businesses
pricingSection.faq1Q: Is the basic plan really free?
pricingSection.faq1A: Yes! Our basic plan is completely free forever. No credit card required, no hidden fees.
pricingSection.faq2A: Absolutely! Upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. Changes take effect immediately.
pricingSection.faq3Q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricingSection.faq3A: We accept UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and mobile wallets.
pricingSection.faq4A: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans.
pricingSection.customSolutionDesc: Large farming operations, cooperatives, and agricultural businesses need specialized solutions. Let's discuss your requirements.

footerSection.newsletterDesc: Get the latest market prices, farming tips, and exclusive offers delivered to your inbox.
footerSection.companyDesc: Connecting farmers to the future through technology. Empowering Indian agriculture with AI-powered solutions, direct market access, and fair pricing.

about.title: About AgriConnect
about.subtitle: Empowering farmers with technology to create a more sustainable and profitable agriculture ecosystem
about.missionText: To revolutionize agriculture by connecting farmers directly with markets, eliminating middlemen, and ensuring fair prices for quality produce. We leverage AI and technology to empower farmers with real-time market insights, quality fertilizers, and expert guidance.
about.visionText: To create a world where every farmer has access to fair markets, modern technology, and sustainable farming practices. We envision an agriculture ecosystem that is profitable for farmers, affordable for consumers, and sustainable for our planet.
about.storyPara1: AgriConnect was born from a simple observation: farmers in India were struggling to get fair prices for their crops while consumers in cities were paying high prices for the same produce. The problem? Multiple layers of middlemen who were taking significant cuts without adding real value.
about.storyPara2: Our founder, while visiting rural Punjab, met farmers who were selling tomatoes at ‚Çπ8 per kg, while the same tomatoes were being sold at ‚Çπ35 per kg in Delhi markets. This massive price gap inspired the creation of AgriConnect - a platform that directly connects farmers with consumers and businesses, ensuring fair prices for everyone.
about.storyPara3: Today, AgriConnect serves thousands of farmers across India, helping them access better markets, quality fertilizers, and AI-powered farming advice. We're not just a marketplace - we're a comprehensive platform for modern agriculture.
about.subject: Subject
